website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality and inexpensive way to introduce infants and toddlers to music.
pros: Sizing and features geared towards infants and toddlers
Has eight piano keys and six animal sounds
Lightweight and easy to fold up and store
Energy saving mode shuts it off after a few minutes of inactivity
cons: tends to move around a lot when kids use it
Some buyers said this option arrives broken

customer_reviews.title: Funny and useful for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a kid friendly mat. I have a toddler and a baby and they both are happy to play together with this mat. My baby enjoys the melodies and he recognizes the rhymes too. My daughter teaches my son to learn the animal names through these animal sounds. Fun to watch the kiddos. Initially my son was a little scared to touch but then he liked it very much and this mat keeps him engaged. He touches and kicks the keys and enjoys the sounds. Easily foldable and can be wiped off easily if something is spilled on it.The volume control button is an advantage as you can adjust accordingly. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rag

customer_reviews.title: AA batteries needed NOT AAA like it says....
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves it. Only issue is it says it takes AAA batteries.... My sister let me know it needs AA, they listed it wrong and need to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I brought a music mat (the blue one) right after my baby was born. It only worked for one week, and then broken. I never trusted or brought any other music mat until I saw this one month ago. I was going to return it if it’s broken again. However, the little pink music turned out to be huge and nice. My older one, who is 5 and 48 lb. can stand on it without broken it. I am totally shocked by quality, and will definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina G

customer_reviews.title: One year old LOVES this item !
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful item lies flat on the floor for children to press with fingers, hands, feet. It is soft and can be folded or rolled up. Top row has several animal depictions and when each key is pressed the animal sound is heard. Second row is a short keyboard and has a key for each individual note which can be used to play childhood nursery rhymes by an adult, or any notes in any order by a child. When the button at the end of the second row SWITCH is pressed, when each musical key is pressed nursery rhyme music is heard for each key pressed. SWITCH back to one musical note for each key.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: love that it has volume control
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this I didn't even realize it had volume control so that was a VERY pleasant surprise as many toys don't. My baby loves to smack it and make music, she refuses to walk on it for some reason but the dog likes to walk on it and make music. The animal sounds are really cute and I love that it also plays songs. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: TessV84

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I do not like that this product doesn't have an actual volume control. There is a plastic piece that moves over where the sound comes out but it doesn't lower the volume just muffles it slightly. It came folded so I assumed you are able to fold for storage but I was mistaken. If you fold it too many times it will get tangled inside and not work properly. I would save your money and get a better made product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, fun toy, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I put this under my baby's jolly jumper for that extra "oomph." It slides around a lot, which is annoying, but you could put lightweight velcro dots on and stick it to a hard floor. The sound quality is good but when it's been on for a bit it starts to fade out. I turn it off and back on. The animal sounds are fun. Mine randomly oinks and makes splashing sounds even though there is no pig. I wish there were a pig. My baby loves the oinking! All-around good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Cute for toddlers of all ages
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide variety of stimulating toys for my boys and my baby niece I watch. She's almost a year and just starting to toddle along. She has a blast with this. It's fun to watch her expressions of shock and awe as she smacks or stomps each little key. My boys are almost 4 and love playing with it too. They try and make little tunes, or sit with her and show her different beats. Too cute. And the nicest thing for me? The volume isn't obnoxiously loud!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived in a timely manner. In fact, according to the shipping instructions, I was expecting it to arrive after my nephew's birthday but it arrived before so I was able take it to his party. I put batteries in to test it and it worked perfectly. I thought this was so cute, I almost kept it for myself and I don't have children...LOL! My nephew and everyone else loved it.
customer_reviews.author: K. P. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Fun piano mat for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old loves this floor piano. It has different settings so you can play single keys or set it to play a whole song. It also makes animal sounds which is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesseca

customer_reviews.title: We play fun tunes and watch each other put on dances and ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby and 2 year old are having a blast playing on this! This toy is a blast to play on . We play fun tunes and watch each other put on dances and it really stimulates their minds and makes it easy to avoid activities like sitting and watching tv to keep the kids active. What a fun toy!!!
customer_reviews.author: William Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Grandsons 1st bday. I received it quickly and in great shape! My grandson likes it a lot but right now he is getting used to noise coming from it. He'll step on it and then pick it up and toss it! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this toy - it is super fun. Not only is it colorful and has a variety of options (different sounds, volume, prerecorded songs etc) but, it also seems to be pretty sturdy. It is quite large so we fold it up and put it away when its not in use. I really like that it came with a small songbook that uses colors and numbers to play songs on the piano. Overall, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brant

customer_reviews.title: Cute piano
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my infant but my 5 years old seems to enjoy it more so far. A cute piano that teaches appreciation for music.
customer_reviews.author: SNY531

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality but overall good product
customer_reviews.text: I will say you can tell it’s cheaply made but it works and will be cute for a toddler. I don’t think it will last forever but it does play cute music and sounds. FYI IT NEEDS “AA” BATTERIES NOT “AAA”. Found this out after I opened it. Overall, it’ll be a good gift for a child who enjoys music.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Pirrung

customer_reviews.title: This is a perfect gift for babies and toddler
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift for babies and toddler! Plays music and makes animal sounds- they will love it!!! Shipping was great and the product is great! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Big fun
customer_reviews.text: This is just fun, make sure you have batteries handy and a good amount of open room to lay it out because it is big. I think some of the adults had as much fun as the kids with this piano mat. I would definitely recommend for a kid who enjoys moving around and making music.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Funny music mat
customer_reviews.text: It’s very awesome for infants to 3 years kids, having very fun and easily learn animal sounds and numbers and they are enjoying with music even which is very fun. It’s very good looking, I bought this for gifting to someone and it’s great value for money. Kids can enjoy with this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Kumar S

customer_reviews.title: Mozart underneath your feet
customer_reviews.text: My babygirl who is 11 months old absolutely loves this piano! Especially now that she walks everywhere this toy is a great incentive for her to continue fighting her fear to fall on the ground. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, good sound
customer_reviews.text: I think my one year old granddaughter will like this. At first I didn’t see the switch and could figure out how to turn it on. I even called Amazon to complain, and found the switch and turned it on, so that was kind of embarrassing🥴but the important thing is it works. They have to take it back to Grrmany, so I think it’ll be easy to pack.
customer_reviews.author: JKJ

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Love that it has volume control and on/off switch. Zero issues with batteries as others stated I bought it for my 6 week old puppies for stimulating colors and noises. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for a little girl and she loved it! I wish the volume could get louder but even that it is a great gift for toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cute piano mat. My son just turned 2 and him and my 18 month niece both liked playing with it. I like that there are songs that it can play in addition to the traditional key notes.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: It's definitely worth the buy. We love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter still plays with this. Very good for the price. The dial is great and the max volume is loud but not amnyingly loud. She lives the animal sounds as well. My 7 year of was jealous he now wants one for his birthday 😁
customer_reviews.author: Emmalee

customer_reviews.title: Musical genius
customer_reviews.text: So adorable and fun. Infants to toddlers will love. This was purchased as a gift for 1 year old
customer_reviews.author: LSC

customer_reviews.title: False advertising-not for under 3 yo
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. Works perfectly. The issue I have is that it's listed under gifts for 1 year olds and it shows babies walking on it. When we received it the packaging and instruction guide clearly states it is only for children 3 yo and older. I bought it for my friends 1 year old. There are no small parts so I'm not sure why, but I'm sure the parents won't like getting a toy that their 1 yo daughter can't use for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: Musical mat.
customer_reviews.text: This musical mat was an instant success. I purchased this for my youngest grand daughters first birthday. She immediately began crawling all over it creating her own music. Nice product. My only request would be to ship this product in a normal box like most things are in when you buy them. This arrived in a plastic bag, no labeling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable and multi functional
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We use this for our newborn for tummy time for extra encouragement and stimulation. Sound is loud, mat is soft and foldable and portable. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Lee Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: This piano mat keeps my granddaughter busy for a good amount of time. It is loud enough to get her attention and has enough different buttons and sounds to keep her attention. All in all it was a great gift for her.
customer_reviews.author: Sloop 64

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and pretty useless
customer_reviews.text: So flimsy. Doesnt stay put even with a rubber mat underneath it. 1 yr old thought the "toy" part of it was the hard plastic corner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and does not work
customer_reviews.text: I would never buy this product again and quite frankly I'm upset that I can not get my money back. My niece opened it for Christmas and it doesn't even have sensors in it. I put brand new batteries in it and the piano wouldn't even come on. Very cheap quality as well. I order a lot of things from Amazon and am a satisfied customer, but this product is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Xena Heflin

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: my son loves this toy, and seems pretty durable. the only issue i have is that some of the lining material inside the pad bunches up together and you keep having to straighten it out. not a big issue though.
customer_reviews.author: ali edalat

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I honestly wouldn't have bought this if i had tested it first. My baby gets all tripped up on it. It moves to much when she's standing on it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Fun little toy for our puppy.
customer_reviews.text: We used this musical mat for our puppy to work on desensitizing to sounds. She loved it and it had nice volume control and a variety of sounds. She also loved the crunch noise of walking on it.
customer_reviews.author: Colbi Wade Stowers

customer_reviews.title: Arrived not working
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and doesn't work. The volume is just static. We got it for our child's birthday and now have to go through the return process. We will not be replacing this one. I will be looking for a different one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for price
customer_reviews.text: Good, kind of small but you get what you pay for. Pretty loud considering price. Love the volume control
customer_reviews.author: laChelle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Our little one is having fun with this. The only challenge is it isn't as sensitive as we'd like. She has to step right in the middle of the key. If she is near the side it doesn't activate. Overall well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Beeston

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 and neither worked!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson the first one didn't work so had them send a replacement and sadly it didn't work either. So, I wouldn't waiste my money on this if I we're you.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within minutes
customer_reviews.text: Product looks just as it does in the pictures. Put batteries in and the mat worked for maybe 5 minutes before the sound was bad and it stopped playing all together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great purchased for my baby. He's having so much fun listening to music and noises. I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product. I love it
customer_reviews.text: I have received the music blanket I am longing for, and the babies like it very much. The appearance is simple and generous, the packaging of the product is strong, and the fabric is soft. When it arrives, the babies will dance all the time, which helps to develop the baby's sense of music
customer_reviews.author: Ying L

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter adores this mat! I have kept it laid out in our living room since she opened it on Christmas cause this is her go to toy!
customer_reviews.author: Noella

customer_reviews.title: Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat and she is very interested in it. A very pleasant distraction for her.
customer_reviews.author: kbraven

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my grand baby, he is 13 months old. He dances on it, better than I expected, all kinds of wonderful sounds, he loves it,keeps him busy too
customer_reviews.author: ann taylor

customer_reviews.title: Baby and toddler love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to switch between piano sounds to nursery songs and having a few animal sounds to through in. Both my 8 month old and toddler love it! Made with quality materials, only issue I have is not being able to adjust sound volume. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this and a water drawing mat for my 1 year old daughter and niece they love both ! This especially ! Super easy and they have so much fun with it !
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Eee
customer_reviews.text: The animal sounds are mechanical/robotic. The duck sounds like it’s straight from hell.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda French

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay flat on ground.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and love the concept. A design flaw I hope they fix would be to have some sort of anti-slip on the back. I have a 3 and 1 year old that like to play with it. However it bunches up too easily. If there was as one sort of traction to keep in place on our floor, this would receive a higher rating from us.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Irenze

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: They loved it bought it as a gift. Its very cheap feeling but it was about the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Requested refund but got another mat instead.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the mat for my grandson and had it sent to my daughters home. The mat didn’t work even when she used new batteries. She returned the item and we asked for a refund. She received a new mat even when we requested a refund and did not want another mat! I just received a notice saying I was charged again for this item.
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: Did not last past a month
customer_reviews.text: Nope. This purchase was a fail. It did not last a month with normal use by kids. The inside twisted up and then it just became useless. We tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: one of the sounds doesn't work and hasn't ever. Kind of cheap, wish I'd got a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 years old son drives me crazy every day I guess that is what people called terrible 2! This piano mat really help me a lot. Every time I take out the mat, he can play for hours. He laughs when the music goes on so I laugh with him. This mat made well, good quality ! Not only has the music stored but also he can create music. It is a good gift! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS

customer_reviews.title: Adorable fun product for baby!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 11 months old. It's fun for both him and us! Great sounds. Easy to use. Good value. Gives us a fright if we forget to turn it off and a cat steps on it.
customer_reviews.author: MissLyssa

customer_reviews.title: cute product.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for a 10 month old to use as she grows. She was fascinated by the sounds and the flashing lights. It made her smile and squeal. The animal sounds were a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: spratt

customer_reviews.title: Good educational toy
customer_reviews.text: This mat is awesome. My kid love to step on it to learn the sound of different animal and number. It is loud and easy to play.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not as good of quality as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't gift. The Inside piece slides all around and bunches so it's a pain to even use it correctly. Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Taren Vetelino

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy for babies and toddlers.. I like that it is so easy to fold and store.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Hands and feet on toy
customer_reviews.text: Both the baby and parents loved them his hands-in musical toy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Great experience. Had to try it out before giving to my great nephew for his birthday and it is delightful.
customer_reviews.author: Dmajeeo

customer_reviews.text: Wads up and is hard to keep flat after some use. Once it gets messed up then the sounds do not really line up with the pics anymore
customer_reviews.author: Mona W

customer_reviews.title: Great my little ones
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old nephew loves this thing. My sister is using it to teach him about animals.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Was not satisifed with product
customer_reviews.text: One animal and one key did not work. Batteries needed are double A not triple A
customer_reviews.author: cd

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Cery affordable and of good quality. My daughter loved this!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Are Loud And Songs Age Appropriate
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 12 month old granddaughter. Sounds with motor skills were spot on for age appropriateness. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: S Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great under a baby jumper, music adds to the fun of jumping
customer_reviews.text: I put it under one of those suspended jumpers for a baby so that when his feet hit the floor he played music. He loved it
customer_reviews.author: E. A.

customer_reviews.title: Great music toy for kids age 1 to 6
customer_reviews.text: My two boys love playing with it. It just sits on the floor in our family room and they run or walk over it all the time. Sometimes they spend upto an hour trying different sounds and recording random music. It's also getting the little one interested into music in a fun way. It's a great gift idea as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Carrie

customer_reviews.title: a big disappoint as it was birthday present----
customer_reviews.text: Completely dysfunctional --no sound--no nothing. a big disappoint as it was birthday present----
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy however, I gifted it to my niece and the sounds do not match the animals. For example, the cat made a chicken sound. My niece is too young to understand and liked the noises so we opted to keep it. However, it could cause confusion when she gets older and thinks that cats bock.
customer_reviews.author: Steffany Corbin

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter. She's one year of age and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Just ok for us
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok toy. My child steps all over it but the mat doesnt stay in place so she loses interest in it pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: VaneS.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use for baby
customer_reviews.text: Good for my 12mon old Baby she plays with this nie that shes not scared of the farm animal sounds lol.
customer_reviews.author: Candice López

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for feet coordination!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my one year old daughter. She LOVES this! She will pull it out and stomp all over it! She’s learning how to control her feet and steps and this has help drastically! She knows how to change between music and sounds, and knows how to make the sound she wants to hear play.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Woods

customer_reviews.title: Fun item
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my (1 year old) great niece,she is loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really fun, easy to put away and move around. Granddaughter loved it and so did the pets!
customer_reviews.text: Good entertainment for all! Got it for granddaughter but have 2 kittens who loved it to!
customer_reviews.author: Magdalyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy for a one year old to use.  Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my grand daughter for her first birthday. She loved it. She too young to realize what to do but she love making the noise and music. I got it because it remind me of the movie Big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but slips on hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: Sure, great toy, she loves it! The piano keys are easy to activate and she loves the music and animal sounds, too. Slips on the hard wood, though, and with socks. Much easier on the carpet and with bare feet. 4/5
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: It's a good item
customer_reviews.text: It does slip a little, but can just put a non slip pad under it. Got for my 1 1/2 year old. She loves it. Volume doesn't get super quiet, but eh. It's for making noise right? Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Woods

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this mat and I love that it does piano sounds, as well as animal and song sounds as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ishtar7677

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: The animals on the mat play their respective sounds as well as the keyboard! I didn’t even realize when I bought it. I was a cute surprise. Great mat!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Multiple settings & fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: This kid's musical mat is longer in size than I expected, which is excellent! It would make a great gift for a young child. The mat is soft and comfortable. The musical mat also has a suitable volume output. The piano mat works great and makes for easy musical fun! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryse Rixner

customer_reviews.title: Like the movie Big
customer_reviews.text: Just like described. I don't know about the baby I bought it for but I had a ball with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tuell

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for little one
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy! it works great and is very easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Deja

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much it doesn't take up much space to store away.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Perreault

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My one-year-old daughter and six-year-old daughter both love this little piano! It entertains them for hours and the sounds on it are really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Stein

customer_reviews.title: Cute piano mat!
customer_reviews.text: Fun, lightweight piano mat! My baby girl loves playing with this!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Marhon

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My 8 months old makes music while getting exercise. It keeps her busy. I like it overall.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Baby sound mat is a great gift for a girl with a kid.
customer_reviews.text: It will make sounds and help the baby move around. Idk was a impulse buy for a chick I know with a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy. My granddaughter likes the different noises it makes
customer_reviews.author: krob729

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not non-slip
customer_reviews.text: The mat works great, but there’s no non-slip grip on the back and it bunches up easily. My 16mo likes the sounds, but the yellow “box” lights up too and then she goes and tries to play with that instead. I’m sure when she’s a little older, it will work better for her.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie V

customer_reviews.title: The picture is of a baby, about 1 years old.  The toy says it is suitable for 3 to 10 years.
customer_reviews.text: The fine print says ages 36 months to 10 years. Look at the picture of the item. Does that kid in the diaper look 36 months old?
customer_reviews.author: Ben G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This item is so much fun for for our great little niece.
customer_reviews.author: bentley

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: The product is nice. It's simple. It was a gift for our 10mo old. It could be heavier weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this..all the different tones and songs..rolls up and easy travel toy
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Baby (and mama) love it! Wish it was a little bigger tho, and you should definitely have carpet for it.. I am gonna have to figure out how to make it non slip for my hardwood floors :)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Tighe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work at all :( was supposed to be a Christmas gift for my son. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Great learning toy
customer_reviews.text: The baby had a great time while learning how to make music and light.
customer_reviews.author: B Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 6 months. Random Non pictured animal sounds, Press the dog it makes a donkey sound sometimes, press the bird and makes a water sound. Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: D.B

customer_reviews.title: Really good and interactive
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was super prompt. I like the mat - it is very responsive, the colors are very nice, it does not get stained easily and the kid luved it. I will definitely buy it again or recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Letitia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 18-month-old grandson. He could not make it make enough noise to keep his interest. I was very disappointed.

product_meta.title: zoordo Musical Mat,Kingseye Baby Early Education Music Piano Keyboard Carpet Animal Blanket Touch Play Safety Learn Singing Funny Toy for Kids (Purple)
